sn3.24:1.5: Also asked by the brahmin Devahita at SN 7.13:7.2 and by Sakka at SN 11.16:2.4.
sn3.24:1.6: Giving is not purely a matter of utilitarian calculation. It creates an emotional connection, which is why giving with one’s own hands is important. It’s not just about helping another; it’s also about elevating oneself.
sn3.24:1.14: Note that, while the khattiyas were often said to be the warrior class, there is no difference here.
